ConfigWindow_ActionItem_Description: In this window, you can modify the use conditions for every action.
ConfigWindow_HelpItem_Description: In this window, you can see all commands for combat that can use in for XIV Auto Attack
Configwindow_HelpItem_AttackSmart: Start Attacking in auto-target mode when not in combat. Switch the targeting condition in combat.
Configwindow_HelpItem_AttackCancel: Stop Attacking, please always do it!
Configwindow_HelpItem_HealArea: Open one window period to use one or serveral range healing actions.
Configwindow_HelpItem_HealSingle: Open one window period to use one or serveral single healing actions.
Configwindow_HelpItem_DefenseArea: Open one window period to use one or serveral range defense actions.
Configwindow_HelpItem_DefenseSingle: Open one window period to use one or serveral single defense actions.
Configwindow_HelpItem_EsunaShield: Open one window period to use Esuna,tank stance skills or True North.
Configwindow_HelpItem_RaiseShirk: Open one window period to use Raise or Shirk.
Configwindow_HelpItem_AntiRepulsion: Open one window period to use knockback-penalty skill.
Configwindow_HelpItem_BreakProvoke: Open one window period to use break-combo or provoke skill.
Configwindow_HelpItem_Move: Open one window period to use move skill.
Configwindow_Helper_EditCombo: Click to edit this custom Combo.
Configwindow_AttackItem_Description:
You can choose to turn on continuous GCDs, 0GCDs for the desired profession.
The occupation in the settings is the same as the current in-game occupation, then there will be a reminder to set the corresponding macro.
Configwindow_AttackItem_LoadScript: Click to load a custom loop
Configwindow_AttackItem_ScriptFolderErro: Please set a storage path to use the custom loop properly!
Configwindow_Events_Description: In this window, you can set what macros to use after some skills are released.
Configwindow_Params_Description: In this window, you can set the parameters needed to release the skill.
Configwindow_Params_UseOverlayWindowDesc: This window is currently used to cue the body position in advance.
Configwindow_Params_WeaponDelay: Set the random delay seconds of GCD
Configwindow_Params_WeaponFaster: Set the time to press the skill a few seconds earlier
Configwindow_Params_WeaponInterval: Set the release interval of ability skills
Configwindow_Params_InterruptibleTime: Set the delayed release time of interrupting skills
Configwindow_Params_SpecialDuration: Set the duration of special status
Configwindow_Params_AddDotGCDCount: Set GCD interval for DOT replenishment
Configwindow_Params_PoslockCasting: Use Chanting to move the lock./nEnsures that chanting will not be interrupted by movement.
Configwindow_Params_PoslockDescription: Handle player for pressing LT to ignore the chant lock
Configwindow_Params_KeyBoardNoise: Simulate the effect of pressing the keyboard
Configwindow_Params_ShowLocation: Write out the actions body position
Configwindow_Params_SayingLocation: Calling out the actions body position
Configwindow_Params_ShowLocationWrongDes: Attention: The body position error is not very accurate, for reference only.
Configwindow_Params_LocationWrongTextDes: If you are in the wrong position, how do you want to be scolded!
Configwindow_Params_AutoSayingOut: Shout out when the state changes
Configwindow_Params_UseDtr: The status is displayed on dtrbar./nLocated in the upper right corner of the screen next to the time.
Configwindow_Params_UseToast: Status is displayed in the center of the screen
Configwindow_Params_UseAOEWhenManual: Use AOE skills in manual selection mode
Configwindow_Params_OnlyGCD: Use only GCD loop, remove ability skills
Configwindow_Params_AttackSafeModeDesc: Absolutely guaranteed not to play AOE when a single target, even if the must-kill skill is also./nBut if the number of hostile reaches the standard, still will use AOE.
Configwindow_Params_NoDefenceAbilityDesc: It is recommended to check this option if you want to play Raids./nSchedule your own healing and healing timeline.
Configwindow_Params_AutoDefenseForTank: Automatic use of damage reduction skills (the timing of use is not quite accurate)
Configwindow_Params_AutoDefenseForTankDe: Attention: Automatically use damage reduction skills won't recognize AOE skills which don't deal damage.
Configwindow_Params_AutoProvokeForTankDe: When a hostile unit is hitting the non-Tank itself, it will automatically use the Provoke skill.
Configwindow_Params_RaisePlayerByCasting: Resurrection by chanting when invincible against the target
Configwindow_Params_LessMPNoRaise: When MP is lower than the set value, do not use the resurrection skill
Configwindow_Params_HealthDifference: Set the HP standard deviation threshold for using AOE healing skills(ability & actions)
Configwindow_Params_HealthAreaAbility: Set the HP threshold for using AOE healing ability
Configwindow_Params_HealthAreafSpell: Set the HP threshold for using AOE healing action
Configwindow_Params_HealingOfTimeSubstac: Set the HP threshold drop with hot effect(AOE)
Configwindow_Params_HealthSingleAbility: Set the HP threshold for using single healing ability
Configwindow_Params_HealthSingleSpell: Set the HP threshold for using single healing action
Configwindow_Params_HealingOfTimeSubstac: Set the HP threshold drop with hot effect(single)
Configwindow_Params_HealthForDyingTank: Set the HP threshold for tank to use invincibility type skills
Configwindow_Params_TargetToHostileType1: All targets that can be attacked are hostile targets
Configwindow_Params_TargetToHostileType2: If the number of targets that are attacking the squad is zero, then all targets that can be attacked are hostile
Configwindow_Params_TargetToHostileType3: Only targets that consider squad members as targets are hostile targets
Configwindow_Params_AddEnemyListToHostil: Set the target in the hostile list to hostile
Configwindow_Params_ChooseAttackMark: Priority attack on targets with attack markers
Configwindow_Params_AttackMarkAOEDesc: Attention: Checking this option , AA will attack as many hostile targets as possible, while ignoring whether the attack will cover the marked target.
Configwindow_Params_FilterStopMark: Never attack a target with a stop sign
Configwindow_Params_ObjectMinRadius: Set the minimum target circle threshold possessed by the attack target
Configwindow_Params_ChangeTargetForFate: Select only Fate targets in Fate
Configwindow_Params_MoveTowardsScreen: When using movement skills, select the object in the center of the screen as the target
Configwindow_Params_MoveTowardsScreenDes: 设为是时移动的对象为屏幕中心的那个，否为游戏角色面朝的对象。
Configwindow_Params_RaiseAll: Resurrect all targets that can be resurrected, even if they are not squad members
Configwindow_Params_RaiseBrinkofDeath: Resurrect the target even if it has Brink of Death status
Configwindow_Params_HostileDesc: You can set the logic of hostile target selection to allow flexibility in switching the logic of selecting hostile in battle.
